title:
Counting subgroups of the groups ${\Bbb Z}_{n_1} \times \cdots \times
  {\Bbb Z}_{n_k}$: a survey
abstract:
We present a survey of exact and asymptotic formulas on the number of cyclic
subgroups and total number of subgroups of the groups ${\Bbb Z}_{n_1} \times
\cdots \times {\Bbb Z}_{n_k}$, where $k\ge 2$ and $n_1,\ldots,n_k$ are
arbitrary positive integers.
